description: The ECM-ADLN-N97, designed by BCM Advanced Research, is a sophisticated 3.5” Single Board Computer. It boasts advanced capabilities, including DDR5 RAM support, dual 2.5GbE ports, and multi-display functionality. Additionally, it’s available in a fanless, slim PC form factor for efficient and compact deployment. As its name implies, this product is built around the Intel Processor […]
title: ECM-ADLN-N97 3.5” Single Board Computer Incorporates Intel Alder Lake-N Processor
